author: nicolaken
msg: Added SkinconfTransformer to the pipeline.
Make the augmented skinconf vierwable in the browser for debugging
at /skin/skinconf.xml.
Make the n-th change to the skinconf pipeline - yesterday was *definately*
not my day.

author: nicolaken
msg: Added SkinconfTransformer, that augments the skinconf.xml
by adding these attributes to colors if not present:
@highlight
@lowlight
@font
@link
@vlink
@hlink
In this way they don't have to be specified in every skin but still can
be overridden if needed.
In the future it can be used with any other skinconf enhancement
(for example add an enable-* tag for all *-disable tags and viceversa)

author: nicolaken
msg: Add 'refresh-code' target that recompiles the Forrest Jar and deployes
it in the forrest dist.
This makes it faster to do coding of new cocoon components in Forrest.

author: nicolaken
msg: Ok, so this is the right ordering.

author: nicolaken
msg: The common skinconf.xls is always there, no need to check.
Change the transformation order, as the most specific one
must have the last say.
